messages.subject: Speaking of Rude!
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hm… wonder when her contract is up …or if her style is supported by the magazine. Wow. Life is good (but this went way over the top for me.) ~Mary
messages.messageBody:
>>And to think she participates in a homeschooling magazine and gives people
>>advice! There are plenty more people with just as much unschooling
>>knowledge (if not more) who can convey that information to an audience
>>*without* the hateful remarks and belittling comments.
Hm� wonder when her contract is up �or if her style is supported by the
magazine.>>

Wow.

Life is good (but this went way over the top for me.)
~Mary
